long_description: The REI Microfleece Cloche hat for women is a perfect mix of dressiness and sportiness with warmth and an attractive look that never goes out of style. Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) lightweight fleece offers higher wind-resistance than traditional fleece without compromising breathability. REI Microfleece Cloche hat has a touch of stretch for a great fit.
short_description: The REI Microfleece Cloche hat for women is a perfect mix of dressiness and sportiness with warmth and an attractive look that never goes out of style.
